channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group LTD -- IdeaPad
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group LTD -- IdeaPad

item.title: CVE-2018-9069|2024-08-05T07:17:50.652Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd -- ideapad
item.description: In some Lenovo IdeaPad consumer notebook models, a race condition in the BIOS flash device locking mechanism is not adequately protected against, potentially allowing an attacker with administrator access to alter the contents of BIOS.
